input.sentences: my little brother had a great day at his birthday party .
he really liked riding in his new red wagon .
the children loved playing in the water .
[male] brother did not know what to think about the water .
in any case | the goodies were great and everyone had a good time .
output.sentences: Parents celebrate their son's first birthday inviting kids in the neighborhood, a boy gave him a giant soccer ball.
Protective mom takes away the giant soccer ball and gives him a smaller ball he could hold in his red wagon.
The proud boy was playing in the kiddie pool and having a great time.
Finally the birthday boy made it in the kiddie pool and he screaming about the cold water.
The mom told the kids what the goodies they just ate, it was "chocolate covered ants"
